vote.title: Authorize Supplemental Agreement No. 4 to the professional services contract with Ogletree, Deakins, Nash, Smoak & Stewart, P.C., to provide legal services to represent the City of Dallas in the lawsuit styled Terrance Bass, et al. v. City of Dallas, Civil Action No. 3:17-CV-03330-C - Not to exceed $100,000.00, from $250,000.00 to $350,000.00 - Financing:  Liability Reserve Fund
